data.text: A New Way of Making Websites
data.styles: mt-2 relative z-10 max-w-3xl text-3xl leading-8 font-extrabold tracking-tight text-gray-900 lg:mx-auto

data.text: We are revolutionizing the world of small business web design and development with our cutting-edge page builder that offers an affordable, all-in-one website solution for businesses like yours. Our platform eliminates the need for hand coding by providing easy-to-use tools for creating and customizing websites, while still delivering the high-quality design and functionality that your business needs to succeed online.
data.styles: mt-4 relative z-10 max-w-2xl text-xl text-gray-600 lg:mx-auto
mt-5 mb-6 text-base  font-semibold tracking-wide uppercase

data.text: Maintenance and edits are all built right into each website package so there's no annoying monthly subscription.
All of our sites are made from scratch using our own code. This allows us full control over the design and functionality, leading to more traffic and conversions.
The #1 reason visitors will leave a website is if it's slow to load. Our sites are lightning fast, accessible and SEO friendly to rank higher on Google and provide a better user experience.
We use a unique pricing model, so you enjoy affordable packages, roughly half the price of others, no monthly maintenance fee & no hidden fees.
